notes_zh: 所有從香港國際機場 (HKG) 出發的航班，均須遵守香港民航處的規定，即禁止在飛行途中使用流動電源，亦禁止將其存放於頭頂行李架。本資料庫數據僅供參考，出行前請務必與您的航空公司核實最新規定。
notes_en: For all flights departing from Hong Kong International Airport (HKG), regulations from the Hong Kong Civil Aviation Department (CAD) apply, which prohibit the in-flight use of power banks and their stowage in overhead compartments. This data is for reference only. Please verify the latest regulations with your airline before traveling.
